p: A total of 520 (35.1%) patients required ICU admission and 193 (13.0%) died. In the multivariable analysis, age 65–74 and ≥75 years was associated with lower ICU admission (aOR 0.63, 95% CI: 0.46–0.87 and 0.25, 95% CI: 0.18–0.35, respectively). Male sex and obesity were associated with ICU admission and seasonal influenza vaccination was associated with lower ICU admission (aOR 0.72, 95% CI: 0.52–0.98) ( Fig 1 and S1 Table).
